snippet: Mr. Gligoric was considered one of the greatest players of the 20th century and pioneered several systems of moves, but he never won the chance to compete for the world championship.
abstract: Svetozar Gligoric, pioneering Chess grandmaster, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Gligoric was considered one of the greatest players of the 20th century and pioneered several systems of moves, but he never won the chance to compete for the world championship.

headline.seo: Svetozar Gligoric, Chess Innovator, Dies at 89
headline.main: Svetozar Gligoric, Who Pioneered Chess Moves, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: Svetozar Gligoric, 89, Dies; Pioneered Chess Moves
